message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be highly valuable to your operations.  While I can't disclose all the details right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to part with it for $1,250,000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a game-changing asset at a price point that's beneficial for both of us. Please let me know your thoughts.
